title: upadEsham shei
sahitya:
upadEsham shei appanE inda uLLam oDungiyunnil uLLapaDi irukka


anupallavi

  japatapa dhyAna samAdhi layam aDaindE sahaja niSTai kUDi un sannidhiyil irukka


caraNam 1    jagamellAm alaindum en cancalam tIravillai sAttirak-kaDalum en dAham taNikkavillai
sukhamAga iniyum un summA irundiDavE sUkSmam shollip-param jyOti vazhi kATTi
    caraNam 2    anbuk-kaDalE unnaiyanri oruvarillEn tunbak-kaDal kaDakkat-tuNai nI puNai nIyE
tenbAl appanE mOna cinmuddirai kATTi enpAl irakkam koNDE ippaDi iruvenrOr
